jhelp.gui.game

Class JHelpAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • jhelp.gui.game.JHelpAnimation

  • public final class JHelpAnimation
extends java.lang.Object
    An animation.
    Animation is cut in frames.
    Each frame is a new sprite position.
    Between each frame, its specify an interpolation way see JHelpAnimation.Interpolation
    Author:
    JHelp

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  JHelpAnimation.Frame
      Represents a frame
      static interface  JHelpAnimation.Interpolation
      An interpolation.

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int fps
      Animation FPS (Frame Per Second)
      private java.util.ArrayList<JHelpAnimation.Frame> frames
      Frames list
      static JHelpAnimation.Interpolation INTERPOLATION_EXPONENTIAL
      Default exponential interpolation :
           et-1
      f(t)=----
           e-1
      static JHelpAnimation.Interpolation INTERPOLATION_LINEAR
      Linear interpolation :
      f(t)=t
      static JHelpAnimation.Interpolation INTERPOLATION_LOGARITHM
      Default logarithm interpolation :
           ln(t+1)
      f(t)=-------
            ln(2)
      static JHelpAnimation.Interpolation INTERPOLATION_SINUS
      Default sinus interpolation :
           1 + sin(t*π - π*0.5)
      f(t)=----------------------
                     2

      Last added frame
      private long lastTime
      Animation last play time

      Animation start time

      Sprite start X
